# Testing Instructions

> This is a reference file for GitHub Copilot.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/standards/code/testing.md`

## Quick Rules

- **Coverage:** Write tests for all business logic
- **Location:** Co-locate tests with source files
- **Naming:** `*.test.ts` or `*.spec.ts`

## Full Standards

For complete testing standards, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/standards/code/testing.md](../../.ai/standards/code/testing.md)

Apply these standards to all test code in this project.

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub Copilot compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/standards/code/testing.md` which is the single source of truth.
